column4: hi all... i tried syncing my ipod shuffle with banshee, and it appears to be succcessful, but nothing gets reflected in my device... please help...
hi all... i tried syncing my ipod shuffle with banshee, and it appears to be succcessful, but nothing gets reflected in my device... please help...
it works fine with gtkpod, but i wish it would work with banshee....
what signals do you get when updates are available?
i'm sorry there's a confusion.. i'm talking about my ipod shuffle...
